helptext_nbrofpeopeeating.name: Nr. of people includes
helptext_nbrofpeopeeating.content: In the above shown numbers are the tax benift numbers included.

helptext_diets.name: Diets help text
helptext_diets.content: For more information click on the diet. If a dietary will be shown with ared background it means that this dietary is dangerous

helptext_nboftb.name: FTB Name
helptext_nboftb.content: Numbers of participants with tax Benifts

helptext_howpeopleweek.name: How many People per week
helptext_howpeopleweek.content: How many participants ate during the week

helptext_fbtweek.name: How many FBT per week
helptext_fbtweek.content: How many participants ate during the week and had tax benefits

helptext_tickinfo.name: Tick Explenation
helptext_tickinfo.content: If the tick is green () then its a Tax Beneift

helptext_weekovervoewbydays.name: How many people this week
helptext_weekovervoewbydays.content: For how many people ate this week

helptext_signoffsheet_info.name: Frontend Signoffsheet explenations
helptext_signoffsheet_info.content:
Please make sure that you tick always for every Mealtime which you want to vist. Make sure as well that you tick with the right type. (Press the Blue information button for more information).
You cannot find your name because you are a Casual or a Guest? No problem add your name to the list. If you are a new Employee please talk to the right person...

helptext_btndefault_sheet.name: Untick/Not ticked
helptext_btndefault_sheet.content: You are not ticked or you wish to untick

helptext_btnpacked_sheet.name: Packed tick
helptext_btnpacked_sheet.content: You want to have your meal take away from the staff fridge

helptext_mpgeneral.name: General Help
helptext_mpgeneral.content: If you wish to edit a Mealplanner you have to click on the pencil and then it will appear on the right side. If you wish to create a new Mealplan you only have to fill out the right side forms and click on save. If you wish to edit or add a new Mealtime please navigate through the Tabbar and clickn on the name Mealtimes. Its the same for meals.

helptext_draganddropmp.name: Helpext drang and drop
helptext_draganddropmp.content:
To change the order of activation you can drag and drop the list above. Please note if you change the order to the first Element of the list you will activate this list for the current Week!
Organge Button
The orange button with the star in it allows you to activate or inactive a mealplan complete. Inactive in this content means that they will be not selected to be shown.

helptext_repeat.name: What is the meaning of Repeat:
helptext_repeat.content: Repeat: This option means that this meal will repeat itself on every day where no meal can be find. For example: You only have set a meal on Sunday adn ticked repeat. As a result of this the planner will show everyday whitout a meal this meal.

helptext_delinfomt.name: Delete warning for mealtimes:
helptext_delinfomt.content: If you delete a mealtime you will delete at the sametime all database entires where someone ate here!

helptext_msoption.name: What does Packable/FTB means:
helptext_msoption.content:
Packable: This feture means that people can pack their own lunch. If its ticked people can choose between 3 options when they tick: Normal, FBT and Packed
FTB: [Dummy text]

helptext_mpname2l.name: Mealplan name error
helptext_mpname2l.content: A Mealplanname must be longer then 2 letters!

helptext_mpnomt.name: Mealplan no mealtimes
helptext_mpnomt.content: A Mealplanname must have at least 1 mealtime!

helptext_mtletters.name: Letter in the mealtime name
helptext_mtletters.content: Every Mealtime need a name with more then 2 letters and a start and finishing time

helptext_mletters.name: Letter in the meal name
helptext_mletters.content: Every Meal must have at least 3 letters

helptext_add2mt.name: Add 2 mealtimes
helptext_add2mt.content: You cannot add two times the same Mealtime!

helptext_star.name: What means a star
helptext_star.content: stands for how the people like the dish. The value is out of 10

helptext_clickonmealtoremove.content: To remove a meal please click on it. If you wish to change the order you can drang and drop them up and down.

helptext_clickonmealtoadd.name: Click on Meal to add
helptext_clickonmealtoadd.content: Choose meal from dropdown to add to list
